snippet.title: The Luminist | DigiPen Institute of Technology
snippet.description:
In 3D action horror game The Luminist, the player controls a man trapped in a forgotten subterranean mining town after an elevator crash. Within these darkened caverns lie terrifying monsters which you’ll have to fend off with an oil-fueled grenade launcher on your quest to escape, learning what happened to this strange place along the way. 

----

https://www.digipen.edu | DigiPen Institute of Technology

DigiPen Institute of Technology is a world-renowned leader in education and research in computer interactive technologies.

As the first school in the world to offer a four-year degree in video game development, DigiPen Institute of Technology has advanced the game industry for more than two decades by helping students become skilled software developers, computer engineers, game designers, digital artists, musicians, and sound designers.

DigiPen Institute of Technology offers degree programs in Video Game Programming, Game Design, Animation, Computer Science, Music and Sound Design, and Computer Engineering. Graduate degree programs include a Master of Science in Computer Science and a Master of Fine Arts in Digital Arts.

For details about our graduation rates, the median debt of students who completed these programs, and other important information, please visit: digipen.edu/disclosures
